name: Gamepad Massage
description: Gamepad Massage is a massage game, in which you can use your XBOX controller for Massage. You can even build your own rhythms of the massage using java-script.It have some builtin levels for you to learn about how to write the codes you need.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: must support opengl Storage: 1 GB available space
